alert.note: Alert for Haywood (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Haywood County through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Belle Eagle, or near Brownsville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Belle Eagle, Holly Grove, Jones, Oakview, Allens, Owl City, Christmasville, Rudolph, Tibbs and Sunnyhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
